item.title: Leftist Smear Group Attacking RFK Jr. Led By ‘Queer Trans Activist,’ Funded By PornHub’s Parent Company
item.description: The leftist group targeting Robert F. Kennedy Jr. is funded by PornHub's parent company Aylo, which admitted to profiting from sex trafficking.

item.title: Dem Senators Side With Big Pharma Over Kennedy’s Bipartisan MAHA Message
item.description: Democrats greeted President Donald Trump's pick to lead HHS with hostile interrogations over abortion and vaccines.

item.title: Is Penny Schwinn A Wolf In Sheep’s Clothing For The Education Department?
item.description: Conservatives in Tennessee are warning President Trump that his pick for the Education Department has a poor track record on education.

item.title: LAFD Terminated Firefighter For Refusing Covid Vaccine Just Months Before Deadly Wildfires
item.description: The Los Angeles Fire Department fired a firefighter for refusing the Covid vaccine after the mandate ended, even though he had an exemption.
